Honestly? Very fun game. Its intense on both sides which is extremely rare for a killer v survivors game. Usually its everybody wishing to be the killer but this game makes both sides equally appealing. If you prefer a solitary approach, hunting down a four man squad of bozos, and purposely making other players lives a living hell playing as the killer will satisfy you to the utmost. On the opposite end of the spectrum are the squads of survivors, if you prefer teamwork and a bit more of a challenge this is definitely the team for you. Playing with friends and strangers are both really fun and i hope you enjoy the game as much as i do. :P
very good game, much fun and very competitive

You like it or you hate it.
Things you have to keep in mind when you'll buy this game;
You wont be good at the game immediatly
Each new update come with his lot of bugs, but they care care of it in some weeks
This is NOT a competitive game, even if people act like it is, so dont take the game too seriously

I like how you have to adapt to certain scenarios in order to survive. I like the different perks and items you can use, making it so you can have whatever kind of build you want. Sure it's a little buggy but no game is perfect. Just go in with the mindset of "I dont care if I lose" and just have fun. I am glad to play this game and highly recommend it to people.
